name: sharp-heic-lambda-layer
description: Lambda Layer providing sharp with HEIC support

scripts.prebuild: docker pull lambci/lambda:build-nodejs12.x && docker tag lambci/lambda:build-nodejs12.x amazon/aws-sam-cli-build-image-nodejs12.x
scripts.deploy: sam deploy --s3-bucket $(echo $SAM_BUCKET) --s3-prefix lambda-layers --template-file packaged-template.yaml --stack-name lambda-layers --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region $(echo $AWS_REGION)

author: Andreas Zoellner
